InventoryID: Palermo, Bank of Sicily—Mormino coll. 385, from Selinunte
Bibliographic References: Ode'on, p. 36, no. 43, pi. 15 cNon Sepcifiedd; Beck, Album of Greek Education, fig. 366
Imagery Description: Orpheus, with lyre in left hand, seated between two women (Muses?), to left with lyre, to right holding out scroll above open box. Below the handles: female heads.
